posts.message:
Guys,

What's the best self hosted script to run email marketing campaigns, we all know MailChimp, CampaignMonitor .etc which gets freaking expensive if you have a lot of subscribers, we used this simple script http://codecanyon.net/item/newsletter-system/52667 but it was very very elementary with few tracking options.

I'm looking for a self-hosted email newsletter system with a bit more advanced options that preferably can work with Wordpress.

This seems like a hot option:
http://codecanyon.net/item/mymail-email-newsletter-plugin-for-wordpress/3078294

What do you think?
posts.caption: codecanyon.net
posts.description: PHP Open Source Newsletter System Easy to use newsletter system written in PHP . Heaps of features which allow you to quickly send professional newsletters to your member database. D...

#ruby #rails #ROR

From your experience what is the best value for ExecutionTimeout ?
cause we have a page that will let the user upload files but in case the user Internet Line is slow, he will end up seeing "System.Web.HttpException (0x80004005): Request timed out." 
What do you think ?
posts.caption: stackoverflow.com
